Uses of Package
org.jogger

Packages that use org.jogger
org.jogger Entry point classes (such as Jogger and org.jogger.JoggerServer) used to configure and run a web application. 
org.jogger.http A decent HTTP request/response API. 
org.jogger.http.servlet An implementation of the HTTP request/response API that uses the Servlet API underneath. 
org.jogger.routes Provides classes to load routes using different mechanisms (from a file or using annotations). 
org.jogger.test The testing infrastructure for Jogger applications. 
 

Classes in org.jogger used by org.jogger
Jogger
          A server that handles HTTP requests using the provided middleware list.
Middleware
          A middleware provides functionality to the life cycle of the request.
MiddlewareChain
          Used in the Middleware#handle(...) method to call the next middleware registered in Jogger.
MiddlewaresFactory
          An alternative way of creating the array of middlewares that are going to be used by Jogger.
Route
          Holds the information of a route.
Route.HttpMethod
           
RouteHandler
          This interface is used in the RouterMiddleware to create routes easily using anonymous classes.
 

Classes in org.jogger used by org.jogger.http
Route
          Holds the information of a route.
 

Classes in org.jogger used by org.jogger.http.servlet
Route
          Holds the information of a route.
 

Classes in org.jogger used by org.jogger.routes
Route
          Holds the information of a route.
RoutesException
          Generally thrown when a problem occurs loading the routes (different from a parsing error)
 

Classes in org.jogger used by org.jogger.test
Jogger
          A server that handles HTTP requests using the provided middleware list.
Route
          Holds the information of a route.
